newsitem.title: GERMANY: Germany tops up 10-yr, 30-yr Bund issues-Buba.
newsitem.headline: Germany tops up 10-yr, 30-yr Bund issues-Buba.

text.p: Germany will top up its 6.0 percent 10-year and 6.5 percent 30-year Bund issues by two billion marks each, bringing the volumes to 19 billion marks and 12 billion marks respectively, the Bundesbank said on Friday.
The Bundesbank, as issuing agent, said it would offer the additional volumes as of July 29 as part of its normal market smoothing operations.
